fix: Fixed game breaking bug that occured due to failures loading the changelogs
Fixed changelog date stamp to correctly display date of patch
Removed 'stores' property from upgrades, as they're now redundent
Updated upgradeUtils to have a mapper function to map a list to a upgrade object to help make it easier to diagnose problems
Extracted UI components specifically for the gold UI elements so that there's no redundent complete re-rendering of all gold UI elements
minor: Now added a new menu that can be viewed via a button (that's temporarily just in the middle of the screen), which displays patch notes
Functionality enabled for showing changes of 3 primary categories: fix, minor, major, which each relate to a number in the game version
